name: PartyTime
0:
”Alexa ask Party Time how many days until Christmas.”
”Alexa tell Party Time to add Bob's birthday on March 22.”
”Alexa ask Party Time how long until Bob's birthday.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: party time
des:
Get countdowns by month, week, day, hour, minute, or seconds until your favorite party holiday or a family Member's birthday.

icon credit: Party Popper by Sumana Chamrunworakiat from the Noun Project
